scene_description_enriched: Two male figures, both with halos, stand facing each other. The figure on the left wears a blue robe over a gold tunic and holds an open book. The figure on the right wears a red robe over a gold tunic and holds an open book. Both figures have beards and appear to be engaged in discussion or study. The background is a dark, solid color, suggesting a non-specific or spiritual setting. The scene is framed by a decorative border.
